data.text: It had been a while since I had become Zenno Rob Roy's trainer――
data.processed: <story>It had been a while since I had become Zenno Rob Roy's trainer――

data.text:
Good work today too. 
I'm looking forward to tomorrow also.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Good work today too. 
<story>I'm looking forward to tomorrow also.

data.text:
Thinking about it―― I reached for the documents sitting 
on my desk. I had gathered these to use in future training.

choices.text: Read these when you get a chance

data.processed:
<story>Thinking about it―― I reached for the documents sitting 
<story>on my desk. I had gathered these to use in future training.

data.text:
Ah, okay! Thank you very much. 
I'll be sure to read them carefully.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah, okay! Thank you very much. 
<story>I'll be sure to read them carefully.

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
(There are so many books next to those documents…… they have book 
covers on them but, if they're that thick, they must be some kind 
of technical training books)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(There are so many books next to those documents…… they have book 
<story>covers on them but, if they're that thick, they must be some kind 
<story>of technical training books)

data.text:
(I've seen them yawning in the morning, 
so they must be staying up late studying them……)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(I've seen them yawning in the morning, 
<story>so they must be staying up late studying them……)

data.text: Eh? ……Ah, S-sorry! Um, well……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Eh? ……Ah, S-sorry! Um, well……

data.text:
N-no no! I'm fine, don't worry about it. 
I just had something on my mind, that's all……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>N-no no! I'm fine, don't worry about it. 
<story>I just had something on my mind, that's all……!

data.text: (Oh no, I'm making them worry about me……!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(Oh no, I'm making them worry about me……!)

data.text:
(……but, that's just how they are. Trainer-san is 
always worrying about me, and encouraging me)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(……but, that's just how they are. Trainer-san is 
<story>always worrying about me, and encouraging me)

data.text: 『Don't lose!』
data.processed: <story>『Don't lose!』

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……！！

data.text: 『You're the main character, Rob Roy!!』
data.processed: <story>『You're the main character, Rob Roy!!』

data.text: 『You're the main character, Rob Roy!!』
data.processed: <story>『You're the main character, Rob Roy!!』

data.text: (It's wasted on me…… isn't it?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(It's wasted on me…… isn't it?)

data.text: (But, they said I'm a 『Hero』)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(But, they said I'm a 『Hero』)

data.text: ……Hehe, ehehe.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……Hehe, ehehe.

data.text:
Oh, you're in a good mood～. 
Rob Roy, did something good happen?
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Oh, you're in a good mood～. 
<story>Rob Roy, did something good happen?

data.text:
Ah…… S-sorry. 
Um, well…… I was laughing now because…… ummmm……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah…… S-sorry. 
<story>Um, well…… I was laughing now because…… ummmm……

data.text:
Wait, wait! Let me guess. Hmmm～……Ah! I got it～! 
You found a funny book! It has to be that. So, was I right!?
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Wait, wait! Let me guess. Hmmm～……Ah! I got it～! 
<story>You found a funny book! It has to be that. So, was I right!?

data.text: ……Fufuu. Well, the truth is――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……Fufuu. Well, the truth is――

data.text:
And they often ask if something's troubling me. 
They're always looking after me, they're a kind person.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>And they often ask if something's troubling me. 
<story>They're always looking after me, they're a kind person.

data.text:
And they're really studious. Today, they had a bunch of materials 
gathered up too. They're serious when it comes to training……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>And they're really studious. Today, they had a bunch of materials 
<story>gathered up too. They're serious when it comes to training……

data.text:
Ehh～! You're so lucky. 
I want to find a trainer like that too～!
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Ehh～! You're so lucky. 
<story>I want to find a trainer like that too～!

data.text: Ehe, ehehe……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Ehe, ehehe……

data.text:
So someone like that really exists, huh…… that's amazing. 
Almost like someone right out of a novel!
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>So someone like that really exists, huh…… that's amazing. 
<story>Almost like someone right out of a novel!

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>――――

data.text: That's true…… they're almost like someone from a novel, probably.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>That's true…… they're almost like someone from a novel, probably.

data.text:
I mean, Trainer-san is kind, hard-working, sincere…… they must be 
like a hero, sticking to their beliefs and pushing forward――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I mean, Trainer-san is kind, hard-working, sincere…… they must be 
<story>like a hero, sticking to their beliefs and pushing forward――

data.text: ……? Huh?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……? Huh?

data.text:
Just now…… 
I said 『They must be like a hero』……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Just now…… 
<story>I said 『They must be like a hero』……

data.text:
(……I've always thought that Trainer-san 
is "that type of person"…… but)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(……I've always thought that Trainer-san 
<story>is "that type of person"…… but)

data.text:
Hmmmm～. I wonder though…… It's possible, 
that I've been one-sidedly…… but…… hmmm……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Hmmmm～. I wonder though…… It's possible, 
<story>that I've been one-sidedly…… but…… hmmm……

data.text:
Zenno Rob Roy continued mumbling to herself while gazing at the 
sky from her window. That day, she was unable to find an answer.
data.processed:
<story>Zenno Rob Roy continued mumbling to herself while gazing at the 
<story>sky from her window. That day, she was unable to find an answer.
